item.title: v1.5.11: Updated installer image; corrected handling incompatible user defaults
item.description:
• v1.5.11:
  • - Updated installer disk image
  • - Corrected handling incompatible user defaults
  • - Updated package name to dev.ruittenb.Spaceman
  • - Removed -R from version
  • Package/version changes were made because:
  • - Settings for dev.jaysce.Spaceman may become corrupted if a *-R version of Spaceman is run;
  • - The jaysce project has been inactive for a long time and does not seem to be likely to merge PR's anytime soon.
